record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - July 14, 2008)

[Page: S6672]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to be brought before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that it stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 7:27 p.m., adjourned until Tuesday, July 15, 2008, at 10 a.m.
